attributes.background: Doncaster is legally classed as Scotland yet xl bullies aren’t banned in Scotland so therefore they shouldn’t be in doncaster

rejection.details:
We're not sure whether you want the ban to be scrapped in England and Wales, or only in Doncaster. In any case, we can't accept petitions that call for action at a local level. We also can't accept petitions when we already have a petition about a very similar issue. This is because you are more likely to get action on this issue if you sign and share a single petition.

You may wish to sign this petition: 

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611

Since you started this petition the Scottish Government has announced that it will introduce a ban. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.scot/news/new-safeguards-on-dangerous-dogs/
